definition: enduring while the world lasts (idiom, from Laozi); eternal/for ever and ever (of friendship, hate etc)/also written 天長地久|天长地久
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
(long) time/(long) duration of time
day/sky/heaven
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance

Auld Lang Syne, Scottish song with lyrics by Robert Burns 羅伯特·伯恩斯|罗伯特·伯恩斯[Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1], sung to mark the start of a new year or as a farewell/also rendered 友誼萬歲|友谊万岁[You3 yi4 wan4 sui4] or 友誼天長地久|友谊天长地久[You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3]
pinyin: You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这并不妨碍我们对彼此感情地久天长的信心。

sentences.english: The meeting ended up with the singing of Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 大会以唱“友谊地久天长”结束。

sentences.english: Sometimes people sing an old song called "Auld Lang Syne".
sentences.chinese: 有时，人们还会唱起老歌《友谊地久天长》。

sentences.english: The party is at the end of the song"friendship forever and ever."
sentences.chinese: 晚会在”友谊地久天长”的歌声中结束。

sentences.english: They vowed their love would endure forever.
sentences.chinese: 他们海誓山盟地久天长。

sentences.english: I hope our friendship can be auld lang syne .
sentences.chinese: 我希望我们的友谊可以地久天长。

sentences.english: I sincerely wish us blooming career and lasting friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿我们的事业蒸蒸日上，友谊地久天长。

sentences.english: They sing a traditional New Year song of friendship called Auld Lang Syne .
sentences.chinese: 他们唱着歌颂友谊的传统新年欢歌《友谊地久天长》。

sentences.english: The original and long-day long, just a misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 原来地久天长，只是误解一场。

sentences.english: Wassail toast, simultaneous praise of Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 举杯痛饮，同声歌颂友谊地久天长。

sentences.english: True friendship lasts a long time.
If I can see you next to never , how can I say forever ?
sentences.chinese: 如果我再也看不到你的身影，又怎能说地久天长？

sentences.english: Fifth day of May, "dumpling" Love you, I wish a happy Forever.
sentences.chinese: 五月初五“粽”情于你，祝幸福地久天长。

sentences.english: Not forever, but in the side.
sentences.chinese: 不求地久天长，只求在身旁。

sentences.english: Sincere friendship is everlasting and unchanging.

definition: enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
from dawn to dusk/all the time
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
two hearts beat as one (idiom); a kindred spirit
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to be interdependent
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
real situation/the truth
see 天荒地老[tian1 huang1 di4 lao3]
see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]
pinyin: You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3

definition: lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
romance/love (romantic)/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4]
